item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Saudi clubs eye PSG's Dembele amid contract issues
item.description: The Saudi Pro League is "laying the groundwork" for a move for PSG star Ousmane Dembele.Transfer Talk has the latest.

item.title: 'Insane ...': Patrick Mahomes leads reactions to Belichick missing first-ballot Hall of Fame nod
item.description: The sports world was abuzz on social media after news that the legendary coach wouldn't be a first ballot Hall of Famer broke.

item.title: Nebraska's 24-game win streak ends vs. Michigan
item.description: Nebraska's improbable run, the longest in Division I since the 2014-15 Kentucky team went 38-0, came to a halt against the No. 3 Wolverines.

item.title: Wembanyama 'horrified' by Minnesota shootings

item.title: Rodman, Hayes viral celebration caps off U.S. rout
item.description: Trinity Rodman capped off the USWNT's 5-0 rout of Chile by coaxing coach Emma Hayes into a sideline dance, as a young American squad secured its fifth...
